resources.string: The following animation was designed to help you relax.
Inhale with your nose and exhale with your mouth.
We will provide you with tips and quotes to help you through your day.

string-array.name: happy_quote_list
string-array.item: The secret to happiness is freedom. And the secret to freedom is courage
Action may not always Bring happiness, But there is no happiness without action.
Every man is happy until happiness is suddenly a goal.
We don\'t develop courage By Being happy every day. We develop it By surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to Be happy - it\'s all that matters.
Being happy never goes out of style.
Sometimes your joy is the source of your smile, But sometimes your smile can Be the source of your joy.
Happy people plan actions, they don\’t plan results.
Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance, the wise grows it under his feet.
No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Thousands of candles can Be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not Be shortened. Happiness never decreases By Being shared -Buddha
To Be happy, we must not Be too concerned with others. -AlBert Camus

If you want happiness for an hour — take a nap. If you want happiness for a day — go fishing. If you want happiness for a year — inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime — help someone else.
It isn’t what you have, or who you are, or where you are, or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy. It is what you think aBout. -Dale Carnegie
We tend to forget that happiness doesn’t come as a result of getting something we don’t have, But rather of recognizing and appreciating what we do have. -Frederick Keonig
Everyone wants to live on top of the mountain, But all the happiness and growth occurs while you’re climBing it. -Andy Rooney
The first recipe for happiness is: avoid too lengthy meditation on the past. -Andrew Maurois
Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will Be drawn to you. -Mary Lou Retton

string-array.name: scared_quote_list
string-array.item: The scariest thing is setting your goals too low and meeting them. -Georges Saint Pierre
Many a false step was made By standing still.
Feel fear and do it anyway.
Courage is Being scared to death... and saddling up anyway.
Only those who will risk going too far can possiBly find out how far one can go.
Don\'t fear failure so much that you refuse to try new things. The saddest summary of a life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.
Whether you think you can or you think you can\’t, you\’re right. -Henry Ford
Let us not pray to Be sheltered from dangers But to Be fearless when facing them.
I\'m fearless, I don\'t complain. Even when horriBle things happen to me, I go on.
I feel myself Becoming the fearless person I have dreamt of Being. Have I arrived? No. But I\'m constantly evolving and challenging myself to Be unafraid to make mistakes.
Fate loves the fearless. -James Lowell

I am totally fearless! Well, of course, I\'m not totally fearless. I worry constantly and oBsess over things, But I just don\'t let fear stand in the way of doing something that I really want to do. -Tom Ford
I\'m limitless, spontaneous and fearless. I can take direction and also give it. And I don\'t dwell on celeBrity. -Ester Dean
Once you Become fearless life Becomes limitless
Where there is no fear, there is no courage.

string-array.name: angry_quote_list
string-array.item: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind. -Ralph Waldo Emerson
When angry count to ten Before you speak. If very angry, count to one hundred. -Thomas Jefferson
I am a danger to myself if I get angry. -Oriana Fallaci
When anger rises, think of the consequences. -Confucius
It\’s okay to Be angry, it\’s never okay to Be cruel.
When angry count to ten Before you speak. If very angry, count to one hundred.
The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of us, But those who win Battles we know nothing aBout.
Everytime you are aBle to find some humor in a difficult situation, you win.
Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets Burned.
Never respond to an angry person with a fiery comeBack, even if he deserves it...Don\'t allow his anger to Become your anger.
Speak when you are angry and you will make the Best speech you will ever regret.
Do not let your anger lead to hatred, as you will hurt yourself more than you would the other.
Nothing repels people like an angry face
When your emotions are in motion, take a Break and ponder! -Ernest YeBoah
Healthy people know not to gorge on anger. At the end of the day, they walk away. They choose to end it. And it\’s an easier choice the next time.
Impatience is the Breeding ground of anger.

string-array.name: nervous_quote_list
string-array.item: Nothing fails like success
If you can dream it, you can do it. -Walt Disney
Being nervous isn\'t Bad, it just means something important is happening. -Anonymous
If you don\'t try, there’s no opportunity to succeed. -Katie Lime
Life Begins at the end of your comfort zone. -Anonymous
Don\'t let your mind Bully your Body into Believing it must carry the Burden of its worries. -Astrid Alauda
Every time you are tempted to react in the same old way, ask if you want to Be a prisoner of the past or a pioneer of the future. -Deepak Chopra
Smile, Breathe, and go slowly. -Thich Nhat Hanh
Let yourself Be open and life will Be easier. A spoon of salt in a glass of water makes the water undrinkaBle. A spoon of salt in a lake is almost unnoticed Buddha
You cannot make yourself feel something you do not feel, But you can make yourself do right in spite of your feelings. Pearl S. Buck
Anything that gets your Blood racing is proBaBly worth doing. Hunter S. Thompson
If you\’re not nervous aBout one or two decisions every day, you proBaBly aren\’t trying hard enough Tim O\’Shaughnessy
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them Walt Disney
I know for sure that what we dwell on is what we Become Oprah Winfrey
Twenty years from now you will Be more disappointed By the things that you didn’t do than By the ones you did do. Mark Twain
In order to succeed, your desire for success should Be greater than your fear of failure. Bill CosBy
Smile at strangers and you just might change a life. Steve MaraBoli

string-array.name: sad_quote_list
string-array.item: The purpose of life is to Be defeated By greater and greater things.

"Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart." ― José N. Harris, MI VIDA: A Story of Faith, Hope and Love
"Be strong, Because things will get Better. It may Be stormy now, But it never rains forever.
"Nothing can cure the soul But the senses, just as nothing can cure the senses But the soul." ― Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray
Curiosity will conquer fear even more than Bravery will. -James Stephens
"Sad? Depressed? HeartBroken? Feeling like world\'s going to end tomorrow? No worries, there’s a Taylor Swift song for that"
"Whenever you feel sad, just rememBer that there\'s someone in the world who is pulling a door that says push."

Here\'s a joke: They all laughed when I said I wanted to Be a comedian. Well, they\'re not laughing now

"Exercise is good for your Body and mind. Nudge nudge, wink wink."

Take BaBy steps, Rome wasn\'t Built in a day.
Make sure you get enough sleep. If you can\'t, coffee helps too.
Pain is inevitaBle, But suffering is optional.
Healing doesn\'t mean you were never hurt, it means you no longer allow the hurt to control you.
When everything goes wrong and things seem to fall apart? When noBody Believes in you and you feel so alone? This is the EXACT moment that you got to Believe in yourself.
If you can\'t fly, then run, if you can\'t run, then walk, if you can\'’t walk, then crawl, But whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones that do.
